summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: the first founder card still uses the Sumit photo config but now displays the name “Saloni Singh”, and the second card still uses the Saloni photo config but now displays “Sumit Shrivastav”. However, there are additional unrelated modifications to tracking/summary files that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added content in project tracking file (project_state.json) marking new feature requests unrelated to runtime behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to swap displayed names in frontend/src/components/FoundersSection.tsx and did not request changes to project metadata/tracking files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository summary file (frontend-file-summaries.txt) describing many components and features beyond the requested name swap.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to documentation/summary files; only the name swap in FoundersSection.tsx was requested.
